WorkshopItemInfo.Name: de_aztec (1.6)
WorkshopItemInfo.Description:
The 1.6 version of de_aztec, ported to [i]Holdfast: Nations at War[/i]!
de_aztec was one of the first and most popular defuse maps, first appearing in [i]1.6[/i] and subsequently re-appearing in every game since. It was later removed from [i]Global Offensive[/i] and replaced with Ancient, a spiritual successor.
Supports Army Battlefield and Melee Arena. This map is best suited to smaller populations, the recommended configs available in this repository: https://github.com/AgentNo/holdfast-server-configs . Sappers will be unable to build on this map due to the lack of terrain.
This map also features working bombsite objectives. To plant a bomb, play as T and hold 'E' on either objective.
[url=https://www.models-resource.com/pc_computer/counterstrike16/model/28158/]de_aztec model courtesy of ViGamezBoy.[/url]
Part of the 87th's Counter-Strike: Holdfast Offensive collection. Join us today - https://discord.gg/dakvCACDSF
[h3]Latest Update - v. 1.0.10[/h3] - Reduced the default amount of carpenters on Melee Arena from 6 to 3 for both teams
